Initialze USEFULL test data (just for in-memory database)
Content in large parts from https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/premature-birth/symptoms-causes/syc-20376730 and https://healthywa.wa.gov.au/Articles/A_E/Diagnostic-tests-for-your-baby-during-pregnancy

members.member:
Hello my friend, you came here because you found a mapper that maps stuff and this given mapper is blocking you in your api development? Fear not!
Pls follow the instruktions given below:

member.name: M:SEIIApp.Server.Services.ChapterDefinitionService.GetAllChapters
member.summary: Returns all chapters as an array, also contains the chapter elements of the chapters.

member.summary: Returns the chapter with the given id, also includes the chapter elements of the chapter.

member.summary: Adds a chapter and returns it.

member.summary: Updates a chapter and returns it.

member.summary: Removes a chapter and all dependencies.
